description: This file provides utility functions related to metrics calculation, including computing Words Per Minute (WPM), accuracy, and clamping numerical values. These functions are likely used in a typing speed test application.

methods.name: calculateWPM(correctChars, elapsedMs)
methods.description: Calculates Words Per Minute based on correct characters typed and elapsed time in milliseconds. Returns 0 if elapsed time is zero or invalid.

methods.name: calculateAccuracy(correctChars, totalTyped)
methods.description: Calculates accuracy percentage based on correct characters and total typed characters. Returns 100 if total typed characters is zero.

methods.name: clamp(value, min, max)
methods.description: Clamps a given value within a specified min and max range.
